The provision in question appears in LAW ( " Liability and Joint Liability " ) of Title XII ( " Contentious Proceedings " ) of LAW , at DATE I ( " Criminal Liability " ) , and not among the " punitive provisions " of LAW . It is a general clause which applies both to smuggling offences and undeclared importation or exportation as well as to any " unlawfully imported or exported goods " , irrespective of whether they are prohibited as such .
